testcase.name: should be a positive sum when summing two positive numbers
should be a negative number when one number is negative and absolute-bigger than the other
should be a positive number when one number is negative and absolute-smaller than the other
should be zero when one number is negative and absolute-equal to the positive one
should be a positive sum when subtracting a negative number from a positive number
should be a positive number when subtracting a positive number from a negative number
